::Gutclaw/Explobody/Triggerhappy/Skullgrin::

     Gutclaw and Explobody ar=
rived in Africa after travelling for a while.  Explobody landed at the plac=
e of the signal, and transformed to robot mode.  Gutclaw also changed to ro=
bot mode.  

      Explobody looked around, then shouted,"Hello!!!  Is ther=
e any Decepticons here!!  If you are of Decepticon allegiance, then we are =
here to rescue you and make you part of our Decepticon faction!!!!"

      =
 Gutclaw stood around, silent, and waited for others to show up.
~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Triggerhappy went ahead of Scourge,=
 then arrived in Africa.  He went as close as he could to the distress sign=
al source location, and landed and transformed.  He looked around.  This pl=
ace was a mess!!!  He heard Gutclaw and Explobody in the distance.

     "Y=
ou two!  Get over here!!!  Looks like somebody other than me has been playi=
n' with guns!" he yelled.

     Explobody and Gutclaw came over.  They exam=
ined the bodies.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Skullgri=
n arrived soon after, and transformed to robot mode.  He looked around.

  =
    "Holy Unicron!!  What in the pit happened here?" He exclaimed.

      "=
Two o' these bots have been slagged, and one of 'em is in stasis lock," Tri=
ggerhappy replied.

     Gutclaw picked up Razor's body(or what was left of=
 it).

     "Poor guy, lost his head.  This isn't neat enough to be the wor=
k of Headshot or the others," He said, putting Razor's body back down.

   =
   Everyone continued looking for clues as to what happened. 

      Everyo=
ne else was looking at Razor and Scud, looking for marks and stuff to help =
them visualise the battle.  Meanwhile, Skullgrin investigated closely.  The=
n, he heard a noise.  It was VERY distant noise.  He went to investigate mo=
re, and went further.  Then, Triggerhappy yelled out.

      "The Maximals!=
!!!  The Maximals are situated in South Africa!!!  If everybody has a way o=
f flying, we can attack the Maximals!!" He exclaimed.

       "Really?  The=
y are that close?  Well, they are pretty far away, if you go by land, but, =
I want to rip out some Maxi-guts!" Gutclaw said.
